select.isEqual: SELECT A.YEAR, SUBSTR(A.INSP_PLAN_DATE, 5, 2) MON, A.DEPT_CD, A.PERM_TC, A.IMP_GUBUN, A.CO_NO, A.EQUI_NO, A.EQUI_NM , A.CO_NM, A.BSNO, A.ADDR, A.INSP_NM, A.SER, A.INSP_PLAN_DATE, A.REAL_INSP_DATE , A.FORE_COMS, A.IMP_COMS, A.RMK, A.PROC_TC, A.IMP_CD, A.PROC_NM , (SELECT COMM_C_NM FROM MAORA01.MDA0000M WHERE SYS_TC = 'GIZ' AND KIND_TC = '0003' AND COMM_C = A.PERM_TC) PERM_TC_NM FROM V_GHF0301M_001 A WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND SUBSTR(A.INSP_PLAN_DATE, 5, 2) = #findMon# AND ( (A.IMP_GUBUN = '0104' AND A.PERM_TC IN ('011', '021', '031', '041', '042', '043', '061', '062', '072', '081', '082', '092', '211', '221', '231')) OR (A.IMP_GUBUN = '1501' AND A.PERM_TC IN ('042')) ) AND A.INSP_PLAN_DATE IS NOT NULL AND A.RMK IS NULL AND A.PROC_TC IS NULL AND A.DEPT_CD = #findDeptId# ORDER BY A.INSP_PLAN_DATE, A.EQUI_NM

SELECT A.YY YEAR, SUBSTR(A.INSP_PLAN_DATE, 5, 2) MON, A.BR_CD DEPT_CD, '' PERM_TC, A.IMP_GUBUN, A.CO_NO, A.EQUI_NO, A.EQUI_NM , A.CO_NM, A.BSNO, A.ADDR, A.INSP_NM, A.SER, A.INSP_PLAN_DATE, A.REAL_INSP_DATE , A.FORE_COMS, A.IMP_COMS, A.RMK, A.PROC_TC, A.IMP_CD, A.PROC_NM , '' PERM_TC_NM FROM V_GHF0311M_001 A WHERE A.YY = #findYear# AND SUBSTR(A.INSP_PLAN_DATE, 5, 2) = #findMon# AND A.INSP_PLAN_DATE IS NOT NULL AND A.RMK IS NULL AND PROC_TC IS NULL AND A.EQUI_TC IN (1, 2, 3) AND A.BR_CD = #findDeptId# ORDER BY A.INSP_PLAN_DATE, A.EQUI_NM

SELECT A.YEAR, SUBSTR(A.REAL_INSP_DATE, 5, 2) MON, A.DEPT_CD, A.PERM_TC, A.IMP_GUBUN, A.CO_NO, A.EQUI_NO, A.EQUI_NM , A.CO_NM, A.BSNO, A.ADDR, A.INSP_NM, A.SER, A.INSP_PLAN_DATE, A.REAL_INSP_DATE , A.FORE_COMS, A.IMP_COMS, A.RMK, A.PROC_TC, A.IMP_CD, A.PROC_NM , (SELECT COMM_C_NM FROM MAORA01.MDA0000M WHERE SYS_TC = 'GIZ' AND KIND_TC = '0003' AND COMM_C = A.PERM_TC) PERM_TC_NM FROM V_GHF0301M_001 A WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND SUBSTR(A.REAL_INSP_DATE, 5, 2) = #findMon# AND ( (A.IMP_GUBUN = '0104' AND A.PERM_TC IN ('011', '021', '031', '041', '042', '043', '061', '062', '072', '081', '082', '092', '211', '221', '231')) OR (A.IMP_GUBUN = '1501' AND A.PERM_TC IN ('042')) ) AND A.REAL_INSP_DATE IS NOT NULL AND A.RMK IS NULL AND A.PROC_TC IS NULL AND A.DEPT_CD = #findDeptId# ORDER BY A.REAL_INSP_DATE, A.EQUI_NM

SELECT A.YY YEAR, SUBSTR(A.REAL_INSP_DATE, 5, 2) MON, A.BR_CD DEPT_CD, '' PERM_TC, A.IMP_GUBUN, A.CO_NO, A.EQUI_NO, A.EQUI_NM , A.CO_NM, A.BSNO, A.ADDR, A.INSP_NM, A.SER, A.INSP_PLAN_DATE, A.REAL_INSP_DATE , A.FORE_COMS, A.IMP_COMS, A.RMK, A.PROC_TC, A.IMP_CD, A.PROC_NM , '' PERM_TC_NM FROM V_GHF0311M_001 A WHERE A.YY = #findYear# AND SUBSTR(A.REAL_INSP_DATE, 5, 2) = #findMon# AND A.REAL_INSP_DATE IS NOT NULL AND A.RMK IS NULL AND PROC_TC IS NULL AND A.EQUI_TC IN (1, 2, 3) AND A.BR_CD = #findDeptId# ORDER BY A.REAL_INSP_DATE, A.EQUI_NM

sqlMap.select: SELECT DEPT_ID FROM ( SELECT DEPT_ID FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND SC_DEPT_ID = #findScDeptCd# ORDER BY DEPT_ID ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT A.ITEM_CD, B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM FROM BSC_SYSTEM_ITEM A , BSC_CAL_TYPE_COL B WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND B.METRIC_ID = #findMetricId# AND B.INSERT_GUBUN = '01' ORDER BY B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM

SELECT A.DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NM FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID WHERE (YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID) IN (SELECT YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE (METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR) IN (SELECT METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND METRIC_ID = #findMetricId#) AND DELETE_DT IS NULL) AND OULEVEL < 2
